name: Bob Ross & "Happy Little Trees"
description:
Lab Exercise for INFO247


DIRECTIONS

Using the assets in the Asset Box, attempt to replicate the original visualization. It does not have to be a perfect copy, but try to get as close as possible. This exercise is meant to familiarize you with the basic workings of Figma so it’s okay to have a few “happy accidents”. Reference the Figma Cheat Sheet for a summary of basic commands and a few tips and tricks.
